::Razorclaw::

Razorclaw, not wanting to waste his breath, buts in with some 
important information. "Megatron, I spotted Shockwave at the CF 
fighting with us. Just thought you might want to know..." he trails 
off, transforms, and lies down on the ground a short distance from 
Megatron.


On 22 Apr 2001, at 21:38, gestalt_menasor@... wrote:

> OOC: Dont be offended by what Megatron does here, he is after all a 
> jerk.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Megatron looked up at both of them. He didnt care that they were 
> taller (it's not a big deal guys). He snarled, then grimaced. He then 
> took a few breaths and calmed down. "No, you followed orders Autofire, 
> and for that I commend you,". He then quickly snarled, "but when I 
> want your opinion Fireblade, I'LL GIVE IT TO YOU" he yelled as he sent 
> a flailing backhand towards the taller robot. With Megatron's 
> strength, it didnt matter how tall the robot was. 
> 
> 
>
